actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to prohibit the trapping of certain fish, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to establish as a criminal offense the trapping of salt-water fin fish within the portion of the fishery conservation zone which is contiguous to the State of Florida.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to prohibit the trapping of certain fish, and for other purposes.
